title: 24 Hour RP Purchase
body: hello, this is Awood2009 and I have a problem/question with purchasing RP. I had purchased some RP about a few days ago and I wanted to purchase more again a couple a days ago. Now I remember that when I attempted to that an error message said that I have reached the maximum amount of purchases and that I must wait 24 hours to purchase again. I decided to wait until another day (24 hours) and when I decided to purchase RP again, it still reads that I need to wait 24 hours to purchase again. This has been going on for the past couple of days and I know that 24 hours have passed by, please help solve this problem.

replies.body: I'm not seeing anything that would prevent you from purchasing more unless there were too many attempts made.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in this case, and our billing team can use their tools to take a deeper look with you directly.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can.
It let me make the purchase finally. I guess I was still under 24 hour prevention, but I got it figured out. Thank you
